entries.name: included(modul)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Extends modul with the String::Extend module.

entries.name: to_json(*)click to toggle source
entries.desc: This string should be encoded with UTF-8 A call to this method returns a JSON string encoded with UTF16 big endian characters as u????.

entries.name: to_json_raw(*args)click to toggle source
entries.desc: This method creates a JSON text from the result of a call to #to_json_raw_object of this String.

entries.name: to_json_raw_object()click to toggle source
entries.desc: This method creates a raw object hash, that can be nested into other data structures and will be generated as a raw string. This method should be used, if you want to convert raw strings to JSON instead of UTF-8 strings, e. g. binary data.
